prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with flowing tentacles and a serene expression.
Imagine a ghostly aquatic creature with soft blue hues and delicate fins.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a jellyfish, with glowing blue features and an ethereal presence.
Show me a playful Pokemon that drifts gracefully in the water, surrounded by bubbles.
Make a whimsical creature that has a calm demeanor and a shimmering appearance.
Design a charming Pokemon that embodies the tranquility of underwater environments.
Give me a water and ghost-type Pokemon that has a unique jellyfish-like shape.
